amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 6503, under the order of 12/1/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 70. Record Vote Number: 370.
